H0.text: Which British playwright was killed with a hammer by his lover Keith Haliwell in 1967. John Osborne

H1.text: Which British playwright was killed with a hammer by his lover Keith Haliwell in 1967. Harold Pinter

H2.text: Which British playwright was killed with a hammer by his lover Keith Haliwell in 1967. Tom Stoppard

H3.text: Which British playwright was killed with a hammer by his lover Keith Haliwell in 1967. Joe Orton

A4.text: Halliwell bludgeoned to death the 34-year-old Orton with nine hammer blows to the head.

A5.text: Halliwell bludgeoned to death the 34-year-old Orton.
